name: Burden (itch) (The_Hat_Guy)
description:
Description:

You are a test subject in a mysterious facility challenging you to break out of your chains, but even if you do you are never really free. The game is filled with various mechanics that involving carrying and throwing the steel balls that are chained to you.

Controls:

Walk - A and D or Arrow Keys

Interact - E or Left Mouse Button

Jump - Space, W or Up Arrow

Reset Level - R

Exit to Menu - Esc
